description: Expanded emotion library with 28 emotions across 3 tiers

emotion_texts.calm_supportive: Take a deep breath. Everything will be okay.
emotion_texts.empathetic_sad: I'm so sorry you're going through this.
emotion_texts.joyful_excited: Wow! That is wonderful! I am so excited!
emotion_texts.playful: Hey there! This is going to be fun!

emotion_texts.angry_firm: That's not acceptable. This needs to stop.
emotion_texts.neutral: Hello. How can I help you today.
emotion_texts.comforting: It's okay. I'm here for you, everything will be alright.
emotion_texts.encouraging: You can do this! I believe in you completely.
emotion_texts.thoughtful: Let me think about that for a moment. That's interesting.
emotion_texts.affectionate: I care about you so much. You mean a lot to me.

emotion_texts.melancholy: Sometimes things are hard, and that's okay to feel.
emotion_texts.wistful: I remember those days. It feels like a distant dream now.

emotion_texts.relieved: Oh thank goodness! I'm so glad that worked out.
emotion_texts.proud: Look at what you've accomplished! That's truly impressive.
emotion_texts.sarcastic: Oh yeah, that's exactly what I meant. Totally.
emotion_texts.mischievous: I have an idea, and you're going to love this.
emotion_texts.tender: You're so precious to me. I want you to know that.
emotion_texts.amused: Ha! That's actually pretty funny when you think about it.
emotion_texts.sympathetic: I understand how you feel. That must be really difficult.
emotion_texts.reflective: Looking back, I can see how all of this connects.
emotion_texts.grateful: Thank you so much. I really appreciate everything you've done.
emotion_texts.apologetic: I'm truly sorry. I didn't mean for things to turn out this way.
